data.eml:eml: A new red-eyed Gekko (Reptilia: Gekkonidae) from Kanchanaburi Province, Thailand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bauer, Aaron M., Sumontha, Montri, Pauwels, Olivier S. G. (2008): A new red-eyed Gekko (Reptilia: Gekkonidae) from Kanchanaburi Province, Thailand. Zootaxa 1750: 32-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274239
